titleStmt.title: The weesils a satyrical fable, giving an account of some argumental passages happening in the Lion's Court about Weesilion's taking the oaths.
titleStmt.author: Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

notesStmt.note: Satire in verse on William Sherlock. Cf. BM (compact ed.)
Attributed to Thomas Brown. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
